page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT-JOB SURVEY
page.content: The types of employment in the block have changed with the growth of the villages.The villagers used to work fairly locally, but now the majorityof the workers travel a long way to work.Many drive down the A1 to Stevenage,Welwyn,Bedford,or to Cambride.Some travel to London by rail fromSt Neots.Some work in St Neots or Huntingdon but very few work in the block it's self.Survey of 60 parents. Professionals (e.g. nurses,architects, teachers,soliciters,police etc. 9. Managers (in industry) 12. Skilled Workers (secretaries,tradesmen,etc. 22. Semi Skilled(mainley part time jobs done by mothers during school hours). 13. Self employed. 4.
